refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Armax processes can be coded with Scilab tlist of type 'ar'. armac is used to build Armax scilab object. An 'ar' tlist contains the fields ['a','b','d','ny','nu','sig'].

listitem.para: this function creates a Scilab tlist which code an Armax process A(z^-1)y= B(z^-1)u + D(z^-1)sig*e(t)
